raw_body: JAYAKODY – MITHRA (nee RATNAVIRA) Loving wife of the late Rajah,​ dearly beloved mother of Anil,​ Hiran & Terina (Teri),​ mother-in-law of Nilanthi,​ Daisy and Ajith,​ precious grandmother of Manilke,​ Shaani,​ Timothy,​ Dinouk,​ Danushka & Ishan,​ grandmother-in-law of Janelle,​ Dan & Sachinee,​ great grandmother of Zoe & Yara,​ sister of late Saradha,​ Lalitha,​ Shanthi,​ Viola,​ Sherrington,​ Vonita & Sushila. Mithra’s final journey leaves ‘Jayasiri Medura’,​ Meerigama Road,​ Balagalla,​ Divulapitiya at 3.30 p.m. for Cremation at Kotadeniyawa Cemetery at 4.00 p.m. on Thursday,​ 28th September.061271
